author: James Joyce
text: Dear Budgen: Let me know what day you arrive. Can you bring me a little book on palmistry? I enclose 10 francs. Hope you come soon. I have a lesson for you here perhaps. Eye attack threatening but hope to Christ not. Please reply by return. Can you find what is the price of a book published about a year ago My Three Husbands, author unknown. Sincerely yours James Joyce Glad you liked Ithaca.
